task.title: Properties
task.shortdesc: Use Properties editor to edit the appearance and content of the views chosen for a workspace.

taskbody.prereq: Your user account must have necessary permissions to view the Properties editor.
taskbody.context: To open a Properties, do the following steps:

step.cmd: The Properties editor opens with a list of the views on the left, grouped by type. On the right, the general workspace properties will appear.
Select one of the views in the Properties tree.
Change the data elements for a chart or table or change the styling of a view.
Close the Properties editor by clicking on the Cancel button.
